Name: Yacht Club
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rum-laced and slightly sweet with hints of apricot fruit.
History: Adapted from a recipe purloined from David Embury's classic book, The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Yacht Club contains 137 calories
